verses.name: Daniel 6:17
verses.text: And a stone was brought, and laid upon the mouth of the den; and the king sealed it with his own signet, and with the signet of his lords; that the purpose might not be changed concerning Daniel.

verses.name: Daniel 6:18
verses.text: Then the king went to his palace, and passed the night fasting: neither were instruments of musick brought before him: and his sleep went from him.

verses.name: Daniel 6:19
verses.text: Then the king arose very early in the morning, and went in haste unto the den of lions.
